title: Teak cape rack

properties.name: description
properties.value: A teak cape rack can be built in the cape rack space of a costume room of a player-owned house. It requires 63 Construction to upgrade the oak cape rack and when built, it gives 360 experience. The player must have a hammer and saw in their inventory to build it.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Teak cape rack
For the flatpacked version, see Teak cape rack (flatpack).
Teak cape rack
Icon
Furniture nameTeak cape rack
Released18 October 2006 (Update)
Level63
Experience360 xp
RoomCostume room
HotspotCape rack space
FlatpackableYes
ExamineA cape rack for you to hang your capes on.
Advanced data
Object ID18767
Icon Item ID9818

A teak cape rack can be built in the cape rack space of a costume room of a player-owned house. It requires 63 Construction to upgrade the oak cape rack and when built, it gives 360 experience. The player must have a hammer and saw in their inventory to build it.

The teak cape rack can hold all of the capes listed below, but only 1 cape of accomplishment at a time.

Warning: Any untrimmed skill capes put on the cape rack will become trimmed when taken out after you get 99 in another skill.

Contents

  • 1 Creation
    • 1.1 Upgrade
    • 1.2 Total
  • 2 Capes
  • 3 Products

A '''teak cape rack''' can be built in the [[cape rack space]] of a [[costume room]] of a [[player-owned house]]. It requires 63 [[Construction]] to upgrade the [[oak cape rack]] and when built, it gives 360 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and [[saw]] in their inventory to build it.

The teak cape rack can hold all of the capes listed below, but only 1 [[cape of accomplishment]] at a time.

'''Warning:''' Any untrimmed skill capes put on the cape rack will become trimmed when taken out after you get 99 in another skill.
